documentation.content: If `prometheus.googleapis.com/open_file_descriptor_count/gauge` is about to hit `prometheus.googleapis.com/max_file_descriptor_count/gauge` zookeeper will not be able to handle any new requests and will fail to connect new clients.

conditionMonitoringQueryLanguage.query:
fetch prometheus_target
| { metric 'prometheus.googleapis.com/max_file_descriptor_count/gauge'
  ; metric 'prometheus.googleapis.com/open_file_descriptor_count/gauge' }
| outer_join 0
| group_by 1m
| sub
| condition val() < 1000
